body: the first part was amazing! (and also, you down there, i see you in like every comment section)

Hmm, ... aside from the creepy past reference (she became addicted to sex), "older woman with younger guy" formula works fine. If ever the past history between the male protagonist of To Aru Index and his beautiful mysterious 'senpai' from his high school is finally revealed, I can see an h-doujin (or more than one) drawn by Sasamori Tomoe depicting that event in all its glory.
